about_the_game:
You are a succubus living in the forest, and suddenly one day, a nun comes to you, asking you to help them against the Goblins. Why would humans who have always seen succubus as an enemy ask for your help? You decided to find out... This is a single-player 2D turn-based role-playing game where players will have an adventure in a world full of crises.

story: Adventure in a world called "forest" to finally solve the Goblin crisis plaguing the country.

How to play: Pixel-based turn-based game, an adventure team of succubus and nuns will face a variety of demons.

Collection: You can collect alchemy materials in the game to make food, bombs, potions and other items to help you in your adventure.

Survival: The game adds a little survival element, with the passage of time, the protagonist will feel hungry and sleepy, need to eat, sleep and other ways to restore health.

Day night alternation system: There is a clock in the game. Morning, noon, evening, dusk, night and other time periods will be rotated to create a more realistic gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
sexy clothing
Very few sexual descriptions
No drugs, no alcohol, no instigation of sexual crimes

You are a succubus living in the forest, and suddenly one day, a nun comes to you, asking you to help them against the Goblins. This is a single-player 2D turn-based role-playing game where players will have an adventure in a world full of crises.

How to play: Pixel-based turn-based game, an adventure team of succubus and nuns will face a variety of demons.

Collection: You can collect alchemy materials in the game to make food, bombs, potions and other items to help you in your adventure.

Survival: The game adds a little survival element, with the passage of time, the protagonist will feel hungry and sleepy, need to eat, sleep and other ways to restore health.

Day night alternation system: There is a clock in the game. Morning, noon, evening, dusk, night and other time periods will be rotated to create a more realistic gaming experience.
name: Goblin corrosion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 4570
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This is a 2D turn-based game. The story is set in a fantasy world. The protagonist, a succubus, must fight against the Goblin invasion with the nuns and save the world.
